column5: looking for a good spot to hook into a muskellunge near ear falls or a big pike
i think the musky are at the other end of the lake. i've never seen any caught up that way. big pike? find a weedbed and have at it. they are everywhere.

Exactly. I've never seen or heard of any muskie caught in the Ear Falls section of the lake, not that there couldn't be a couple around, but certainly not worth targeting. The limited muskie in the lake are generally found in the northeast section. But pike . . . everywhere! Deep cabbage weedbeds is you best bet for targeting active pike. The larger the weedbed, and the closer to deeper water the better. NWO Fishing Bum
I have seen one musky in the steamboat area in ten years of fishing Ear Falls area.
